articles.original_title: Every payment method Costco accepts: From EBT to Apple Pay
articles.original_body: Costco is America’s favorite warehouse club, boasting almost twice as many members as its next-biggest rival, Sam’s Club, despite its more expensive membership fees. Another important distinction between the retailers is the payment methods each one accepts. For instance, while you can use any ...
